messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
I can help with thatâ€”tell me the city you are departing from, the destination, dates, and how many travellers so I can shape an itinerary.

I'm planning a business-class trip for 1 adult, departing from Zurich (ZRH) to Sydney (SYD). Please depart on 2025-11-20 and return on 2025-12-05, priced in CHF, and stick to Lufthansa Group airlines.
